titles.title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on fan assisted, plugin, scented oil dispensing, electrothermic appliances.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S1061)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
2/14/2008--Introduced.
Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend temporarily the duty on fan assisted, plugin, scented oil dispensing, electrothermic appliances.
